title: Projects
p1-descriptor: A single-page application that allows users to search and rate movies in real time using the OMDB API. Built with React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to ensure a seamless and intuitive user experience. Deployed on Vercel for fast performance and scalability.
p1-stack: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, OMDB API, Vercel
p2-descriptor: Designed and built a single-page application where users can search for movies and nominate their top five favorites. Leveraged OMDB API to provide real-time movie data and React for an optimized interactive experience. Hosted on Vercel to ensure fast load times and a responsive user interface.
p2-stack: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, OMDB API, Vercel
p3-descriptor: A web application that allows travelers to book rentals and connect with fellow adventurers. Built using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to create a seamless and user-friendly booking experience. Deployed on Vercel for optimized performance and reliability.
p3-stack: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, OMDB API, Vercel
p4-descriptor: Built a modern e-commerce website specializing in athletic apparel, featuring a sleek and intuitive shopping experience. Developed using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, ensuring smooth navigation and responsive design. Hosted on Vercel to provide a fast and scalable online retail solution.
p4-stack: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, OMDB API, Vercel
